text: Capone is a 1975 Canadian American biographical crime movie directed by Steve Carver and written by Howard Browne. It stars Ben Gazzara, Harry Guardino, Susan Blakely, John Cassavetes, Sylvester Stallone and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * Category:1975 crime movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1970s American crime movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Canadian crime movies Category:Canadian biographical movies
title: Capone (1975 movie)
